name: MegaDrone
description:
Play this multiplayer mobile game inspired by arcade classics locally on your mobile screen! Compete with up to three other players to build the biggest MegaDrone within the time limit. You need to strategize between building, attacking, or defending yourself from other player's bullets! Come out as the champion of this chaotic, frantic, and fast-paced game!

Controls:
- Joystick to move your MegaDrone around (feel the experience of controlling the hard-to-control MegaDrone!)
- Staying still will auto shoot your bullets if you have the cannon drone attached
- Shield drone will protect you from collapsing drone parts, but only per one time usage.
